text: Uvidev gibel' etikh nevernykh, on otvernulsya ot nikh i skazal, opravdyvayas': "O moy narod! YA peredaval vam zapovedi vashego Gospoda, kotoryye poveli by vas k Yego miloserdiyu, yesli by vy prinyali ikh. YA daval vam sovety i dokazyval vam pravdivost' znameniy i uveshchevaniy, poveriv v kotoryye vy mogli by spastis' ot nakazaniya Allakha. Zachem zhe mne gorevat' o neveruyushchikh posle tekh nazidaniy, kotoryye ya im daval, i tekh usiliy, kotoryye ya prilozhil, chtoby povesti ikh po pryamomu puti istiny i spaseniya? Ne budet etogo posle togo, kak ya predosteregal ikh. Oni sami vybrali tot put', kotoryy privol ikh k gibeli
